crypto.name: Solomon Lane
crypto.desc:
Osint and Crypto

Mission Brief

They moved in silence, past the flame,Unknown, unseen, without a name.Through laser grids and traps ornate,The team advanced toward sector eight.With every code they reallocate,And spoof the trace to obfuscate.One file remained, the logs rotate—Its label strange, syndicate.Not shouted loud, just tucked away,But those who know decode the play.
Intelligence Hints
#1dGVsZWdyYW06QHNvbG9tb25sYW5l

crypto.name: The Final Reckoning
crypto.desc:
Decode The Entity's final encrypted message
Mission Brief

Ethan you know even if the world does not know they are counting on you. The longer you run the more tedious it gets.Its time we end this for good. The world's fate is written by The Entity. Its time you get under The Entity's shield
Intelligence Hints
#1Patterns are your answers Ethan

misc.name: Finding Gabriel
misc.desc:
Audio

Find Gabriel's location from intercepted audio
Mission Brief

We have located Gabriel from intercepting a shortwave conversation The Entity send him. Find out where he is
Intelligence Hints
#1Listen carefully to the audio
#2Geographic coordinates might be hidden

misc.name: Finding Sevastopol
misc.desc:
Find the key hidden in the sunken submarine
Mission Brief

We have just received the photo of the sunken Sevastopol find what key it has.
Intelligence Hints
#1You know Ethan Dunloe tried his best to send the coordinates to you. What do you comment on that?

net.name: Intercepted Communications
net.desc:
Network

Mission Brief

We captured network traffic between The Entity servers. Analyze the packet capture to understand their communication protocol and extract the hidden flag they are exchanging.

osint.name: Satellite Eyes
osint.desc:
OSINT

Find out where the building is
Mission Brief

Agent Hunt we have got satellite images of a safehouse where Gabriel could be hiding find out where it is.Find the coordinates upto two decimal in form IMF{XX.XX_XX.XX}

rev.name: Missile Launch
rev.desc:
Mission Brief

The Entity has deployed a secure communication system with a missile launch control. Five missiles are fuelling up as we speak.
